Lets import data

```{r}
litters_df=
  read_csv("FAS_litters.csv")
```

Look at your data
```{r}
names(litters_df)
```

updates the names
```{r}
litters_df=
  janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

look at the data
```{r}
litters_df
```

sometimes skimming data is neat
```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```
## Fix the missingness
```{r}
litters_df=
  read_csv("FAS_litters.csv", na = c("NA", ".", " "))
```

Lets import another dataset

```{r}
pups_df=
  read_csv(
    "FAS_pups.csv", 
    skip = 3, 
    na=c("NA", ".", " ")
    )
pups_df=
  janitor::clean_names(pups_df)
```
